<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40daf928-1200-41d8-278b-0072d780434a#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Vendégváró - turisztikai honlap</string>
            <string language="en">Hospitality - home page </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gastfreundschaft - Home Page</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hospitalité - Home Page</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hospitality - Home Page</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ospitalità - Home Page</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φιλοξενία - αρχική σελίδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hospitalidad - Home Page</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A székesfehérvári kazula egyes részeinek (Itélkező Krisztus, Maiestas Domini, István király medaillon) stíluspárhuzamai az összehasonlítás elemeinek körvonalas kiemelésével</string>
            <string language="en">The style-parallels of certain parts of the kazula of Székesfehérvár (judging Christ, Maiestas Domini, king Stephen medallion) roughly emphasizing the elements of the comparison</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">miseruha,  </string>
            <string language="en">chasuble</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Art-Ähnlichkeiten bestimmter Teile des 
kazula von Székesfehérvár (Christ, Maiestas Domini, Medaillon des 
Königs Stephen beurteilend) die Elemente des Vergleiches ungefähr 
hervorhebend</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les modèle-parallèles de certaines parties du 
kazula de Székesfehérvár (jugeant le Christ, Maiestas Domini, 
médaillon de roi Stephen) soulignant rudement les éléments de 
la comparaison</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As estilo-paralelas de determinadas partes do 
kazula de Székesfehérvár (que julga Christ, Maiestas Domini, 
medallion do rei Stephen) emfatizando aproximadamente os elementos da 
comparação</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I stile-paralleli di determinate parti del kazula 
di Székesfehérvár (che giudica Christ, Maiestas Domini, medaglione 
del re Stephen) dante risalto approssimativamente agli elementi del 
confronto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι ύφος-παράλληλοι ορισμένων μερών του kazula 
Szιkesfehιrvαr (που κρίνει Χριστό, Maiestas Domini, 
stephen βασιλιάδων μενταγιόν) κατά προσέγγιση που υπογραμμίζει
τα στοιχεία της σύγκρισης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estilo-paralelos de ciertas partes del kazula 
de Székesfehérvár (que juzga Cristo, Maiestas Domini, medallón de 
rey Stephen) acentuando áspero los elementos de la comparación</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chasuble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chasuble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chasuble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">chasuble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φαιλόνιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">chasuble</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>

            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

    </metadata>
  </description>
